channel.title: D'hide Bodies
channel.description:
My green, red, and blue d'hide bodies all show up as black and red squares. [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/fvZtAl.png[/img]
This wouldn't be a big deal because when you wear them, it's fine, but when you drop them it looks like this: [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/iDOGzk.png[/img]
I've been told I just need to change the inventory customs but how do I do that?

item.title: D'hide Bodies
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I don’t code java, you’d be better asking Tormented, or posting in the client section :).

Read full topic

item.title: D'hide Bodies
item.dc:creator: @Recoil1 Recoil.
item.description:
@Recoil1 wrote:

TormentedSoul:

Seems to me that your ID for the d’hide has been overwritten by an object. I had this problem 2 years ago when I had a delta based server. Try changing the ID? Or if you have a cache download new items and replace your obj.dat and obj.idx with the one your using at the moment?

Someone has to teamview with me to show me.

PM me on here if you’re willing, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: D'hide Bodies

item.description:

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Again, this is to do with the models that were added to the server, re-add them;).
